add_child.title: Engeza ingane yakho

homeschool.title: Qala uhambo lwakho lokufunda ekhaya
homeschool.description: Engeza izingane zakho ukuze uqale ukulandelela inqubekelaphambili yazo, uthole ikharikhulamu ehambisana ne-CAPS, futhi usebenzise amathuluzi ethu e-AI.

supplemental.title: Khulisa ukufunda kwengane yakho
supplemental.description: Engeza izingane zakho ukuze zithole izifundo ezengeziwe, izivivinyo zokuqeqesha, kanye nosizo lokufunda olwenziwe ngendlela yabo.

exploring.title: Siyakwamukela ekufundeni kwedijithali
exploring.description: Joyina i-EduDashPro Community School ‚Äì hlola i-Robotics, i-AI, i-Data Science, ukuthuthukisa i-Frontend ne-Backend. Yakha ulwazi lwedijithali ngokufinyelela kwamahhala okusekelwa izikhangiso.

school.title: Engeza izingane zakho
school.description: Xhumanisa izingane zakho ukuze uqale ukubona inqubekelaphambili, uxhumane nothisha, futhi uhlale unolwazi ngezinto zesikole.

aftercare.title: Bhalisa izingane zakho
aftercare.description: Engeza izingane zakho ukuze zithole izinhlelo ze-aftercare, izibuyekezo zansuku zonke, kanye nokuxhumana nabasebenzi.

default.title: Joyina umphakathi wethu wedijithali
default.description: Qala ukufunda i-Robotics, i-AI, i-Data Science, kanye nokuthuthukisa isoftware. Ukufinyelela okusheshayo nge-level yamahhala (imikhawulo ye-AI yosuku okusekelwe izikhangiso).

cache.about_description: The offline cache stores dashboard data locally on your device for faster loading and offline access. Cache is automatically managed but can be cleared if you experience sync issues.
cache.about_details:
‚Ä¢ Cache expires automatically after 5-10 minutes
‚Ä¢ Data is encrypted and user-specific
‚Ä¢ Maximum cache size is limited to 10MB
‚Ä¢ Cache improves loading speeds by 60-90%
cache.clear_personal_desc: Clear cached data for your account only
cache.clear_personal_message: This will clear all cached data for your account. You may experience slower loading times until data is cached again.
cache.clear_school_desc: Clear cached data for entire school (Principal only)
cache.clear_school_message: This will clear all cached data for your entire school. All staff members will experience slower loading times until data is cached again. This action should only be performed if you are experiencing data synchronization issues.
cache.refresh_stats_desc: Reload cache statistics and health status

pricing.enterprise_subtitle: Our enterprise solutions are designed for large school districts, government education departments, and multi-national education providers.

faq.a1: Yes! You can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, and downgrades take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
faq.a2: No setup fees for Starter and Professional plans. Enterprise plans may include implementation services.
faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards, PayFast, and bank transfers for South African customers.
faq.q1: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?

pricing.free_ribbon: You are on the Free plan
pricing.load_error: Unable to load pricing information. Please try again later.

notes.enterprise_contact: For K-12 Enterprise pricing, contact sales. We tailor seat counts and AI usage pools to your school size and needs.
notes.model_selection: Model selection affects cost; Opus > Sonnet > Haiku. We recommend Haiku for most classroom use.
notes.overages: Overages require prepayment; once paid, access resumes immediately.
notes.quota: AI quotas are monthly and reset at the start of each month.
notes.title: Notes

pricing.restricted_enterprise_only: Only principals or school admins can request Enterprise.
pricing.restricted_principal_only: Only principals or school admins can request Preschool Pro.
pricing.restricted_submit_only: Only principals or school admins can submit these requests.
pricing.subtitle_app: Flexible options for individuals, preschools and schools. AI usage includes monthly quotas. Overages require prepayment.
pricing.subtitle_marketing: Flexible pricing for schools of all sizes. Start free and scale as you grow.

free.desc: Perfect for small preschools getting started
